description: This is the RDF Schema for the RDF vocabulary terms in the RDF Namespace, defined in RDF 1.1 Concepts.
label: The RDF Concepts Vocabulary (RDF)

Alt.description: The class of containers of alternatives.
Alt.label: Alt

CompoundLiteral.description: A class representing a compound literal.
CompoundLiteral.label: CompoundLiteral

type.description: The subject is an instance of a class.
type.label: type

direction.description: The base direction component of a CompoundLiteral.
direction.label: direction

first.description: The first item in the subject RDF list.
first.label: first

language.description: The language component of a CompoundLiteral.
language.label: language

object.description: The object of the subject RDF statement.
object.label: object

predicate.description: The predicate of the subject RDF statement.
predicate.label: predicate

rest.description: The rest of the subject RDF list after the first item.
rest.label: rest

subject.description: The subject of the subject RDF statement.
subject.label: subject

value.description: Idiomatic property used for structured values.
value.label: value
